reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Hydro power technology and business collaboration in India

description.narrative: See 6.5The project consists of two main parts. The first part is pre-feasibility study and the second part is finding partners.The content of the pre-feasibility study consists of trying to find answers to the following aspects of running a business.01. In dustry structure02. Channel structure03. Channel margins04. Pricing structure05. Competitive landscape06. And of course profitability and economic viabilityMost of the work in this part will be carried out by the external consultant.The second part of the project consists of trying to find the right partner. We intend to take the following steps to find the right partner.01. Meet the person who heads the hydro power section in the Ministry of Power. From him we intend to get an overview of the hydro power s ector in the country and other relevant information like actors in the field their strong points and weak points and some idea about channel structure channel margins and pricing structure.02. Meet a professor in the field of hydro power in a reputable ins titute of technology in India. Get to know the state of technology in our field in the country and get answers to similar questions as listed in point 01 above.03. Meet the heads of the hydro power section in industry associations like FICCI and CII and ge t answers to similar questions listed in point 01 above.04. The external consultant Kuldeep Sajjanhar is an alumnus of Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur. IIT Kanpur was ranked number 1 in the country when he graduated from the Institute and is a top-ra nked institute now also. His colleagues from this Institute are or have been at the head of many institutions in India. He intends to use this network to find prospective partners.05. The external consultant's brother Ashok Sajjanhar retired as the ambassa dor of India to Sweden. He also has a very large network of people in business and government. As needed we can tap into his network also.After preparing a list of prospective partners we intend to meet many to prepare a short list and then choose a set of partners.Most of this work will be done by the external consultant.
